en.name: Everyday learning
en.coverDescription: You live, you learn... In the course of their career, people often get several opportunities to develop themselves, both personally and professionally. But more often than not, seizing opportunities to learn can be quite tricky, as they do not always come in an obvious manner. So as a leader, managing staff development is your duty! This course will give you what it takes to accompany your employees throughout their learning path.

fr.name: Apprendre au quotidien
fr.coverDescription: Vous vivez, vous apprenez… Au cours de leur carrière, les gens ont souvent plusieurs opportunités de se développer, tant sur le plan personnel que professionnel. Mais le plus souvent, saisir les occasions d'apprendre peut s'avérer délicat, car elles ne se présentent pas toujours de manière évidente. En tant que manager, vous êtes responsable du développement de votre équipe ! Ce cours est fait pour vous permettre d'accompagner vos employés tout au long de leur parcours d'apprentissage.

de.name: Alltägliches Lernen
de.coverDescription: DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH You live, you learn... In the course of their career, people often get several opportunities to develop themselves, both personally and professionally. But more often than not, seizing opportunities to learn can be quite tricky, as they do not always come in an obvious manner. So as a leader, managing staff development is your duty! This course will give you what it takes to accompany your employees throughout their learning path.
